leadr

Set seed for caret's trainControl

Given a starting seed and number of folds (or resamples), this function creates a vector of seeds needed for the `caret` trainControl object.

caret_seed(seed = 1, number)

Arguments

seed

starting seed for list of seeds
number

number of folds or resamples

Value

List of seeds used by trainControl.

Examples

trainControl(method = 'cv', number = 10, seeds = caret_seed(1234, 10))

#> [1] "cv"
